MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Human Resources

    »

    1. Which one of the following represents one of the capabilities of Dynamics 365 Human Resources employee self-service?

      Completing my performance reviews.

      Request a pay raise.

      View my tasks due today.


    2. Dynamics 365 Human Resources learning module can be used for which of the following?

      Learn how Microsoft Dynamics 365 Human Resources dashboards and analysis works.

      Create courses, track attendance and perform analysis on courses created for an organization.

      Create learning materials and perform analysis on courses created for an organization.


    3. Organizations need to be able to strategically hire and retain talent to thrive and achieve high-impact, sustainable business results. How does Dynamics 365 Human Resources help organizations achieve this?

      It uses AI to identify the most promising prospects, identifying which leads and businesses to focus on, and recommends the next best step to help move each customer relationship forward.

      It creates immersive shopping experiences, gives employees the tools, they need to succeed and provides data-driven insights to help improve businesses.

      It provides the tools and analytics to help organizations hire the right people faster, engage new hires, and keep employees growing and learning.
